description: Main entry point for a Flutter application that sets up the root widget, routes, theme, and state management using Provider. Defines the CalendarApp class which builds the MaterialApp with custom navigation transitions and routing logic.

classes.name: CalendarApp
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that sets up the application's root widget, including theme, routing, and state management.

methods.name: main
methods.description: The main function that initializes and runs the Flutter application by instantiating CalendarApp.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for CalendarApp, configuring routing, theme, and initial state.
